testsuite.name: NumbersTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #7
Number's parity is incorrect. Number 1 should be odd.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter a natural number: > 1 This number is Even.
